thread.title: Anwar: No more delays, let's have RCI on forex losses
thread.title_full: Anwar: No more delays, let's have RCI on forex losses

title: Anwar: No more delays, let's have RCI on forex losses
text:
More 
Bank Negara's disastrous foreign exchange foray in the 1990s should be subject to a Royal Commission of Inquiry and not just a cabinet appointed task force, said PKR de facto leader Anwar Ibrahim. 
Anwar, who was finance minister from 1996 to 1998, said he was willing to assist the commission if it was established but not the task force.
